title: Smart Data Models - Bike Lane Schema

type.description: Property. NGSI-LD Entity Type. It has to be BikeLanes

laneOccupancy.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Indicates the number of vehicles circulating on the lane.

laneLength.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Indicates the length of the lane.

laneWidth.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Indicates the width of the lane.

dateObserved.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'. The date and time of this observation in ISO8601 UTCformat.
